org.mini2Dx.core.controller

Class Xbox360Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.Xbox360Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, MdxController<Xbox360ControllerListener>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinuxXbox360Controller, MacXbox360Controller, WindowsXbox360Controller

    public abstract class Xbox360Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements MdxController<Xbox360ControllerListener>
    Base class for Xbox 360 controller implementations
